title: Prototypes of Everything
excerpt: [digg=http://www.digg.com/apple/Prototypes_of_Everything]It seems that everything Apple does is very simple and intentional; a lot of thought goes into every aspect of every one of their products. I know that using prototypes is a very important aspect of making Apple products great, but what I didn’t realize was that they make prototypes of literally everything. Even their … more →
